import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { stats = { totalCases: 156, activeCases: 89, clients: 234, completedCases: 67 }; recentCases = [ { id: 1, title: 'Caso de Divorcio - Martinez vs García', client: 'Ana Martinez', status: 'En progreso', date: '2024-08-15' }, { id: 2, title: 'Demanda Laboral - Tech Solutions Ltd.', client: 'Carlos Rodriguez', status: 'Pendiente', date: '2024-08-20' }, { id: 3, title: 'Contrato Comercial - ABC Corp', client: 'Maria Lopez', status: 'Revisión', date: '2024-08-25' } ]; }
